param.name: adapter_sequence1
param.label: Adapter sequence for input 1
param.help: The adapter for read1. For SE data, if not specified, the adapter will be auto-detected. For PE data, this is used if R1/R2 are found not overlapped.

param.name: poly_g_min_len
param.label: PolyG minimum length
param.help: The minimum length to detect polyG in the read tail. 10 by default.
